p: Antifungal activity was determined against C. neoformans ATCC90113. Simplicildone K 430 and globosuxanthone E 431 displayed weak antifungal activity against Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC90113 with the same MIC values of 32 μg/mL. Amphotericin B was used as a positive control for antifungal activity and exhibited an MIC value of 0.5 μg/mL against C. neoformans ATCC90113 [ 96].
